summary.para: Contains classes that implement the main functionality of the WPF Dialogs and Dialog Services.
Serves as a base class for the DevExpress File Dialogs.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Occurs when the user clicks the Help button on a file dialog and allows you to provide a help link or cancel opening help resources.
Fires when running DevExpress file dialogs in an unsupported OS (e.g. Windows XP).
Serves as a base class for the DevExpress file dialogs ( and ) and implements common file dialog functionality.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.AddExtension

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the file dialog automatically adds an extension to a file name if an end-user omits the extension.

member.value: true, if the file dialog adds an extension to a file name if the user omits the extension; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.AppendExtensionsToFilterDescriptions

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the file dialog should append affected extensions to filter descriptions.

member.value: true, to append affected extensions to filter descriptions; otherwise, false.

summary.para: For internal use only.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.CheckFileExists

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the file dialog displays a warning if an end-user specifies a file name that does not exist.

member.value: true, if the file dialog displays a warning if an end-user specifies a file name that does not exist; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.CheckPathExists

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the file dialog displays a warning if an end-user specifies a path that does not exist.

member.value: true, if the file dialog displays a warning when an end-user specifies a path that does not exist; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

summary.para: For internal use.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.DefaultExt

summary.para: Gets or sets the default file name extension.

member.value: The default file name extension. The returned string does not include the period. The default value is an empty string (“”).

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.DereferenceLinks

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the dialog box returns the location of the file referenced by the shortcut or whether it returns the location of the shortcut (.lnk).

member.value: true if the file dialog returns the location of the file referenced by the shortcut; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.FileName

summary.para: Gets or sets a string containing the file name selected in the file dialog.

member.value: The file name selected in the file dialog. The default value is an empty string (“”).

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.FileNames

summary.para: Gets the file names of all selected files in the file dialog.

member.value: An array of strings, containing the file names of all selected files in the file dialog.

summary.para: Similar to the event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.Filter

summary.para: Gets or sets the current file name filter string, which determines the choices that appear in a file dialog.

member.value: The file filtering options available in the file dialog.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.FilterIndex

summary.para: Gets or sets the index of the currently selected filter in the file dialog.

member.value: The index of the currently selected filter in the file dialog. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.InitialDirectory

summary.para: Gets or sets the initial directory displayed by the file dialog.

member.value: The initial directory displayed by the file dialog. The default is an empty string (“”).

summary.para: Resets all properties to their default values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.RestoreDirectory

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the file dialog restores the current directory to the previously selected directory before closing.

member.value: true, if the file dialog restores the current directory to the previously selected directory; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.ShowHelp

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Help button is displayed in the file dialog.

member.value: true if the dialog box includes a help button; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.SupportMultiDottedExtensions

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the file dialog supports displaying and saving files that have multiple file name extensions.

member.value: true, if the file dialog supports multiple file name extensions; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.Title

summary.para: Gets or sets the file dialog title.

member.value: The file dialog title.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFileDialog.ValidateNames

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the dialog box accepts only valid Win32 file names.

member.value: true if the dialog box accepts only valid Win32 file names; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Represents a dialog box that allows end-users to browse and select a particular folder.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFolderBrowserDialog.Description

summary.para: Gets or sets the description that is displayed above the folder hierarchy.

member.value: A value that is the description displayed above the folder hierarchy.

summary.para: Resets all properties to their default values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder

summary.para: Gets or sets the root folder from which the navigation starts.

member.value: A System.Environment+SpecialFolder object that specifies the folder from which the navigation starts.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath

summary.para: Gets or sets the selected path.

member.value: A value that specifies the selected path.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXFolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton

summary.para: Gets or sets whether this should display the “Make New Folder” button.

member.value: true, if the “Make New Folder” button is visible; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Represents a dialog box that allows end-users to browse and select a particular folder.

summary.para: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to select multiple files in the current .

member.value: true, if end-users can select multiple files; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Represents a dialog box that allows end-users to specify folder names for one or more folders to open.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXOpenFolderDialogService.Multiselect

summary.para: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to select multiple folders in the current open folder dialog.

member.value: true, if end-users can select multiple folders; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Represents a dialog box that allows end-users to specify a filename to which to save a file.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXSaveFileDialog.CreatePrompt

summary.para: Gets or sets whether this should ask users for the permission to create a file if the specified file does not yet exist.

member.value: true to display a message; false to automatically create a file without confirmation.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.DXSaveFileDialog.OverwritePrompt

summary.para: Gets or sets whether this should warn users when they try to save a file under an already existing name.

member.value: true to display a warning, false to overwrite old files without confirmation.

summary.para: Represents a dialog box that allows end-users to specify a filename to which to save a file.

Provides data tor the event.

summary.para: Gets or sets a help link that is opened when an end-user clicks the help button.

member.value: A that is a help link that is opened when an end-user clicks the help button.

summary.para: Provides data tor the event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.NotSupportedOsVersionEventArgs.Dialog

summary.para: Gets the DevExpress file dialog that cannot be run under Windows versions before Vista.

member.value: The DevExpress file dialog that cannot be run under Windows versions before Vista.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.NotSupportedOsVersionEventArgs.DialogResult

summary.para: Returns a result of a fallback dialog, which was launched instead of the DevExpress file dialog.

member.value: A result of a fallback dialog.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Dialogs.NotSupportedOsVersionEventArgs.Handled

summary.para: Gets or sets whether a file dialog fallback is handled and no default processing is required.

member.value: true, if a file dialog fallback is handled; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Lists values that specify the open file dialog mode for .
